ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby in Lower Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve seen a lot of posts similar to this one on this list, and I have to confess that I m baffled.  My Lullaby works so well that people explicitly ask for
ygData.messageBody:
JasonF wrote:

> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> Well I couldn't help myself, I had to try it.... I decided I'd dust off Lullaby and try it. Heh.
> Never again. I didn't die thanks to the Cleric and Shaman, but Lullaby had virtually no effect other
> than Taunt. If they're mezzed with Lullaby, it's so brief asto be negligible. GZ would probably remind
> me that "higher level mobs have a greater chance of resisting", which is fine I suppose, but damn - give
> me resist messages.

> Crier Sharpsong - 39th song bard on Fennin Ro
>

I've seen a lot of posts similar to this one on this list, and I have to confess that I'm baffled. My
Lullaby works so well that people explicitly ask for it now in any fight with 3 or more MOBs (provided we
have no Enchanter). It gets resisted some, but it still takes the extra (unattacked) MOBs out of the
fight for 50-75% of the time. This is not as useful as Enchanter Mes, of course, and it entirely ties up
my songs for much of the fight, but it's a lot better than dying. My level 32-36 group took out those
five Greater Ice Bones in a single battle, with about half damage and half mana drain overall. Not that
anyone wanted to try it a second time...

Kenross Cantoforjado, 35 songs, Innoruuk
